turbochem-optima.name: Turbochem Optima - Fully Automatic Biochemistry Analyzer

turbostat-plus.description: TURBOSTAT PLUS semi automatic biochemistry analyzer delivers reliable and efficient clinical chemistry results for laboratories of all sizes

ichroma-3.description: Boditech ichroma™ III is a compact POCT analyzer offering rapid and accurate testing across various clinical parameters for healthcare professionals.

ichroma-2.description: Boditech ichroma™ II is an advanced point-of-care testing analyzer designed for quick, precise, and reliable diagnostic results in clinical settings.

labscan-3d.description: Luminex LABScan 3D is an advanced IVD system offering flexible multiplexing and precise diagnostic performance for molecular laboratories.

labscan-100.description: One Lambda LABScan 100 delivers accurate and flexible multiplexing analysis with high sensitivity, ideal for clinical and research diagnostics.

plexmat-8.description: PlexMAT-8 Immunoblot Analyzer offers high-quality automated western blot processing for consistent and efficient immunoblot testing.

iflash-1200.description: YHLO iFlash 1200 Chemiluminescence Immunoassay Analyzer delivers compact, efficient, and reliable testing for routine diagnostic applications.

afias-1.name: AFIAS -1 Automated Immunoassay Analyzer

afias-3.description: Boditech AFIAS-3 Analyzer performs rapid and precise immunoassay testing with high efficiency and automation for diagnostic labs.

afias-10.name: AFIAS -10 Automated Immunoassay Analyzer
afias-10.description: AFIAS-10 Analyzer delivers high-volume, fully automated immunoassay testing with accuracy and efficiency for modern labs.
